entity.name: Women lead House gains for Democrats as Republicans hold the Senate
entity.description:
The latest:

- Democrats capture the House as Republicans maintain grip on the Senate
- House Democratic leader Nancy Pelosi said "We have all had enough of division"
- Women, Muslims and other first-time candidates secured historic wins on Election Day

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @StephenKing Yes. Record breaking 36,000 new cases of COVID-19 in US yesterday. But no need to wear masks or practice social distancing... wonder if there will be enough citizens alive or healthy enough to vote come Election Day?
